name: Sewer Skirmish
description:
Short Description

Manage your gold and use your units in order to protect your sewer base from the enemy! Sewer Skirmish is a turn-based game made in just 3 days,that was originally destined for a game jam . You can spawn rats,turtles,frogs and alligators to fight your enemy inside the sewer system,as well as update your base to gain defense and attack power!

Features

  • Fun and straightforward game play.
  • Beautiful art.
  • Retro aesthetic.

Things you need to know

  • Click on the button under the "Upgrade" text in order to upgrade your base and gain Defense(icon displayed next to the health) and attack power(icon displayed next to the defense) which will make your units deal more damage.
  • Click on the left button under the units menu to finish your round after all your units are done attacking.
  • Click on the right button under the units menu to make time flow faster,if you want to do so.
  • If the unit buttons are red,that means that it's the enemy's turn,thus you can't attack.
  • Press Escape or P to open the Pause Menu and restart or go back to the main menu.
